    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L6
    [int]                                   1         3
    [main]                                  5         8
    [(]                                     9         9
    [)]                                     10        10
L7
    [{]                                     1         1
L8
    [std]                                   5         7
    [::]                                    8         9
    [string]                                10        15
    [text]                                  17        20
    [(]                                     21        21
    ["ąęćśźńó"]                             22        30
    [)]                                     31        31
    [;]                                     32        32
L9
    [std]                                   5         7
    [::]                                    8         9
    [cout]                                  10        13
    [<<]                                    15        16
    [text]                                  18        21
    [;]                                     22        22
L10
    [return]                                5         10
    [0]                                     12        12

    [}]                                     1         1
EOF
